translations: 私掠船；武装民船；私掠船船长；私掠船船员

sentences.sentence: Adding to the supply of privateers and pirates, some of the islands were deliberately peopled with convicts22.
sentences.translation: 为了增加私掠船巡航和海盗的数量，一些岛屿被蓄意安置了流放的罪犯。

sentences.sentence: Occasionally pirates and privateers might capture a large quantity of gold or silver, but such successes were rare.
sentences.translation: 偶尔，海盗和海盗船长们也许会截获数量巨大的黄金或是白银，但是这种时候非常少。

sentences.sentence: Remember, back in the 17th century when privateers brought back not only gold and silks, but also spices to France, some people still thought the world was flat.
sentences.translation: 不要忘记，在武装商船不仅给法国带回了黄金和丝绸，还带回了香料的十七世纪，还有些人相信世界是平的。
